title: The merry deuill of Edmonton As it hath beene sundry times acted, by his Maiesties Seruants, at the Globe, on the banke-side.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616, attributed name.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Henry Ballard for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling at the signe of the white-horse in Paules Church yard, ouer against the great north doore of Paules,
